name: Jérôme d'Ambrosio
introduction: Jrme d'Ambrosio (born 28 December 1985 in Etterbeek, Belgium) is a Belgian racing and Formula One driver of Italian descent. He previously drove for Marussia Virgin Racing in 2011, but did not score any points.  He most recently served as Reserve Driver of the Lotus F1 Team.  Due to a one-race suspension of Romain Grosjean for causing a major collision at the 2012 Belgian Grand Prix, d'Ambrosio drove for Lotus at the Italian Grand Prix.
